p.k: Cassandra Wilson is an unequaled vocalist with a distinctive style; a jazz singer for a new generation. 'Soft Winds' sees her performing first-rate originals and adventurous covers of material by Bob Dylan, Tom Jobim and The Monkees.
p.d: Cassandra Wilson is recognized as an unequaled vocalist, a jazz singer for a new generation. Her distinctive style and daring aesthetic have earned her wide recognition, including chart-topping albums, a Grammy and countless media accolades. In this live recording she inspires with her trademark mix of first-rate originals and adventurous covers of other songwriters' works, this time picking material by Bob Dylan, Tom Jobim and The Monkees.
